DOC.brief_summary: IDPN widely use HD patient without clue effectiveness . Study objective : evaluate IDPN effect mortality ( main objective ) , hospitalization rate , nutritional status , dialysis efficacy , Karnofsky score
DOC.brief_title: Effect Intradialytic Parenteral Nutrition Morbidity Mortality Malnourished Hemodialysis Patients
DOC.detailed_description: IDPN widely use HD patient without clue effectiveness . Study objective : evaluate IDPN effect mortality ( main objective ) , hospitalization rate , nutritional status , dialysis efficacy , Karnofsky score . Patient eligibility : adult patient ≤ 82 HD vintage > 6 mo . 2 follow malnutrition criterion : BMI ≤ 20 kg/m2 , BW loss/6 mo . ≥ 10 % , serum albumin ≤ 35 g/L , prealbumin ≤ 300 mg/L . Recruitment : patient 38 HD unit January 2001 December 2002 Study protocol . Patients randomize 2 group : IDPN group , give IDPN one year , control group . For ethical reason , 2 group give oral supplementation period . Follow-up : two year start nutritional therapy . Study end : December 31 , 2004 . Final result available early 2005 .
DOC.criteria: age 18 82 year hemodialysis vintage 6 month two follow marker malnutrition : body mass index ( BMI ) < = 20 kg/m2 body weight loss within 6 month > = 10 percent serum albumin < = 35 g/L prealbumin < = 300 mg/L weekly dialysis time < 12 h urea Kt/V index < 1.2 serum albumin > 38 g/L prealbumin > 330 mg/L hypertriglyceridemia > 2.5 mmol/L associate comorbidities compromise oneyear survival treatment oral , enteral parenteral feeding last 3 month hospitalization time randomization
